# LazyVim Configuration

Place your custom LazyVim configuration files here.

## Structure

- `config.lua` - Custom configuration overrides
- `lua/` - Custom Lua plugins and configurations

## Installation

Run the LazyVim installation script:

```bash
./scripts/lazyvim.sh
```

This will:
1. Install LazyVim starter template
2. Link any custom configurations from this directory
3. Set up your Neovim environment

## Customization

After installation, customize LazyVim by editing:
- `~/.config/nvim/lua/config.lua` - Main configuration
- `~/.config/nvim/lua/plugins/` - Plugin configurations
